select a.id,a.username,a.password,a.truename,a.lx, a.store_code as storeCode,d.store_name as storename, a.dept_code as deptName,e.dept_name as deptName, case lx when 0 then '系统管理员' when 1 then '库管员' when 2 then '开单员' when 3 then '审核员' end as lxInfo from mf_user a left join mf_store d on a.store_code =d.store_code left join mf_department e on a.store_code =e.store_code and a.dept_code =e.dept_code
a.username like concat('%',#{key},'%') or a.truename like concat('%',#{key},'%')
order by id
